Hydras:

"Rebuilt our base!!! Improve our defences!!!!"said Hydras "The ark=
 will be well guarded for a while... unless we find a way to came in that i=
snt ungarded... They came for her, but she is too worty..." he muttered fro=
m himself "Go to Perceptor, and ask her status" and looking to the bots pre=
sents in the room "I'll need a new security chief, Perceptor will have too =
much work to do... but who?"


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Tuesday, March =
02, 2010 5:07 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimu=
s/BlackFortress


  
> Hydras was furious  looking to allthe presents in th=
e place looked as if he desires to kill them all
>
> "A piece of junk and a=
 rodent... YOU ARE A GOOD FOR NOTHING!!!!! " Shouted mad Hdyras "the only t=
hing right that you have done is avoid that the special prision still remai=
n in our grasp"

"Scrap!' Scourge said , the anger in his voice mirrored on=
 Cyclonus'
face as well. "Those stupid Autobots managed to get away. I told=
 you
they were calling for backup." Scourge groused.

Cyclonus said nothing=
, he just watched Hydras reminded for a moment of
Galvatron and his tirades=
 when he lost the battles. It was good to see
that some things didn't chang=
e.

Scorponok was still inside the torture chamber, so was not in the
immed=
iate view of Hydras. He frowned, intensely angry at hydras for
allowing thi=
s to happen. He had suspected that this would happen. If
they had followed =
his plan they would be at the Ark already reaping
rich rewards. Instead her=
e they were breathing in exhaust from the
cowardly Maximals!

Rodimus on th=
e other hand looked fearful and embarrassed. it was as if
he took it person=
ally that the two had escaped. Perhaps his own
hesitation had allowed them =
to escape. "That stupid Auto-idiot" he
said to himself, "He will pay for th=
is."

He looked up at Hydras, "What now boss?"

(Tag)

Preston
(Cyclonus & =
Scourge/Scorponok/Rodimus)
